transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello ji good morning.
Customer: Ha sir good morning good morning kaise hain aap?
Executive: Ji ji main theek hoon bataiye aap. 
Customer: Ha ye ho gaya tha usi din ha main wahi keh rahi thi ye ho gaya tha aapka usi din but humne dhyan nahi diya tha. To wo logo ko bhi nahi show kar raha tha wo log bhi yahi keh rahe the ki show to kar raha hai. To fir humne bola ki nahi client ke usme nahi show kar raha to unhone fir bola tha ki fir video bana ke aap dikhao hume ki kaha nahi show kar raha kyuki hamare side to show kar raha hai. To wahi main aapko usi cheez ke liye connect kar rahi thi but aapne abhi bataya ki ho gaya hai. 
Executive: Nahi usi din maine Monday ko aapko message kiya maine aapko.
Customer: Ha ha aapne kar diya tha but maine dhyan nahi diya tha yahi to maine bola aapko ki maine dhyan nahi diya tha. To main unko bar bar yahi bol rahi thi ki nahi hua hai nahi hua hai karke aap log check karo mail par main unko revert kar rahi thi. To fir unhone bola ki fir aap video bana ke hume do ki kaha nahi hua hai kyuki jo unki mobile site wali jo team hai jo mobile mein koi bhi agar aapko problem aata hai IndiaMART ke mobile app mein to wo resolve karke deti hai. Unko aisa kuch bhi issues mil nahi raha tha. 
Executive: Nahi.
Customer: Isliye main aapko aaj connect kar rahi thi ki main aapse aaj video bana ke mangu fir ki main fir unko attach kar paun mail par.
Executive: Nahi nahi sahi hai thoda sahi hai abhi. Abhi.
Customer: Theek hai to fir okay theek hai to fir main yahan se na aapka ye abhi concern main aapka abhi close karungi fir jo dobara aapne open kar diya tha. To yahan pe aap kuch achcha sa mere liye feedback share kar dena sir itna kaam karwa rahe ho aap. To thoda achcha hume appreciate karo. Hai na?
Executive: Ha ji ji nahi yaar nahi yaar ji ji ji. Ji aap mujhe email kar do. Ji ji.
Customer: To main abhi yahan se ha email kar rahi hoon main close karungi waha pe aapke pass jayega please waha pe positive achcha feedback de dijiyega theek hai.
Executive: Ha ha ha yaar ha mujhe share karo aap please.
Customer: Ha abhi main kar rahi hoon close karke na aapko share kar rahi hoon baki koi dikkat ho aap kar lena mujhe call directly mere number pe theek hai.
Executive: Ha ha please please okay pakka pakka.
Customer: Okay ji okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's issue was not reflecting earlier.

- Executive asked for positive feedback.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the issue is resolved.

- Executive will share feedback link with customer.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, issue resolved, mobile app
